title: DEBUG: Verify client->transport is set
description: Check if client->transport pointer is NULL when frame transmission code runs. Add log before and after transport checks. Verify transport is initialized in WebSocket client connection.

title: DEBUG: Verify acip_send_ascii_frame return value
description: Check what error code is returned by acip_send_ascii_frame(). If ASCIICHAT_OK, frame should be queued. If error, log shows which error. Run test and report.

title: DEBUG: Frame transmission not firing - render.c
description: Frame transmission code added but not executing. Add debug logs at line 569 (before acip_send_ascii_frame) and line 586 (check client->transport NULL). Build: cmake --build build. Test: bash scripts/test-websocket-server-client.sh. Search: grep FRAME_SEND logs. Report findings.
